SourceAnalyzer.Name: Narvalo Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Custom C# rules used by the Narvalo projects.

Rule.Name: PrivateFieldsMustBeginWithUnderscore
Rule.Context: Private instance fields must start with an underscore: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private instance field starts with an underscore.

Rule.Name: PrivateStaticFieldsMustBeCorrectlyPrefixed
Rule.Context: Private static fields must start with "s_": {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private static field starts with "s_".

Rule.Name: PrivateConstsMustOnlyContainUppercaseLettersDigitsAndUnderscores
Rule.Context: Private constants must only contain uppercase letters, digits and underscores: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private constant contain only uppercase letters and underscores.

Rule.Name: PrivateMethodsMustEndWithUnderscore
Rule.Context: Private methods must end with an underscore: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private method ends with an underscore.

Rule.Name: InternalMethodsMustNotEndWithInternal
Rule.Context: Internal methods must not end with "Internal": {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of an internal method does not end with "Internal".

Rule.Name: PrivateClassesMustEndWithUnderscore
Rule.Context: Private classes must end with an underscore: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private class ends with an underscore.

Rule.Name: AbstractClassesMustNotEndWithBase
Rule.Context: Abstract classes must not end with "Base": {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of an abstract class does not end with "Base".
